title: Harosheth-Haggoyim
content:
HAROSHETH-HAGGOYIM

Town in Canaan that was the home of Sisera. This Canaanite general led his forces from Harosheth against Deborah and Barak (Jgs 4:2–13, kjv “Harosheth of the Gentiles”). After his soldiers panicked, they fled back to Harosheth where they were defeated (v 16).
